abstract: X Prize Foundation awards $5.25 million in Milestone Prizes to five teams for progress in creating unmanned spacecraft capable of landing on moon, moving across surface and sending images to earth; prizes, in separate categories of landing, mobility and imaging, were created due to difficulties and delays in realizing full project.
lead_paragraph: The X Prize Foundation paid more than $5 million to several groups for advances in landing, moving on the lunar surface and imaging.
snippet: The X Prize Foundation paid more than $5 million to several groups for advances in landing, moving on the lunar surface and imaging.

headline.main: Millions Paid by X Prize Foundation for Progress Toward Trip to Moon
